text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale today I was

this is definitely a version you need to

explain to you sort of along the way why
let's get started with the ingredients
not very many you're going to need some
old-fashioned oats what I have here are
some salted peanuts yes I said salted
because a combination of salty and sweet

throw in some dried fruits by all means
do whatever your heart desires switch up

I just love this because it's so

it gives me lovely sort of rich
